senselogic.sitevision.api.format

Interface FormatterBuilderFactory


  • @Requireable(value="FormatterBuilderFactory")
public interface FormatterBuilderFactory
    Factory for creating formatter builders.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getFormatterBuilderFactory(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 6.1
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NumericFormatterBuilder getCurrencyFormatterBuilder(Locale aLocale)
      Returns a builder for creating currency formatters with a given Locale.
      NumericFormatterBuilder getCurrencyFormatterBuilder(Locale aLocale, Currency aCurrency)

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberFormatterBuilder

        NumericFormatterBuilder getNumberFormatterBuilder(Locale aLocale)
                                           throws NullPointerException
        Returns a builder for creating number formatters with a given Locale.

        The builder returned by this method will create instances that are conceptually equivalent with java.text.NumberFormat.getNumberInstance(aLocale).

        Parameters:
        aLocale - the Locale
        Returns:
        a NumericFormatterBuilder that creates number formatters
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if aLocale is null

      • getPercentFormatterBuilder

        NumericFormatterBuilder getPercentFormatterBuilder(Locale aLocale)
                                            throws NullPointerException
        Returns a builder for creating percent formatters with a given Locale.

        The builder returned by this method will create instances that are conceptually equivalent with java.text.NumberFormat.getPercentInstance(aLocale).

        Parameters:
        aLocale - the Locale
        Returns:
        a NumericFormatterBuilder that creates percent formatters
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if aLocale is null

      • getCurrencyFormatterBuilder

        NumericFormatterBuilder getCurrencyFormatterBuilder(Locale aLocale)
                                             throws NullPointerException
        Returns a builder for creating currency formatters with a given Locale.

        Currency note! Currency typically depends on a country. A language-only Locale will typically be formatted without any specific currency. Use getCurrencyFormatterBuilder(Locale, Currency) to actively specify what currency to use when using such locale.

        The builder returned by this method will create instances that are conceptually equivalent with java.text.NumberFormat.getCurrencyInstance(aLocale).

        Parameters:
        aLocale - the Locale
        Returns:
        a NumericFormatterBuilder that creates currency formatters
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if aLocale is null
        See Also:
        getCurrencyFormatterBuilder(Locale, Currency)

      • getCurrencyFormatterBuilder

        NumericFormatterBuilder getCurrencyFormatterBuilder(Locale aLocale,
                                                    Currency aCurrency)
                                             throws NullPointerException
        Returns a builder for creating currency formatters with a given Locale and Currency.

        Currency instances are created via methods in CurrencyFactory.

        The builder returned by this method will create instances that are conceptually equivalent with java.text.NumberFormat.getCurrencyInstance(aLocale) with a java.util.Currency.getInstance(aCurrencyCode) set.

        Parameters:
        aLocale - the Locale
        aCurrency - the currency
        Returns:
        a NumericFormatterBuilder that creates currency formatters
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if aLocale or aCurrency is null
        See Also:
        CurrencyFactory

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
